forum.content:
Hey fellow English speakers,🙌🏼
I just moved back from the states about half a year ago, currently serving in the military. It's been hard to make new friends since I lived abroad for so long, I talk awkwardly in Chinese; plus, I don't really get the opportunity to meet new people. Shoot me a message or friend request if you want to chat, make friend, or practice English. Oh, and I speak intermediate Japanese too, also self-teaching French 😗
forum.title: CSU Alumi looking to make friends n help
